title: Is Kamala Harris not eligible to serve as President of the United States?
subtitle: The requirements for serving as President of the United States have been defined for over 200 years and have not changed much since then.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Ms. Kamala Harris is not entitled to serve as President of the United States because neither of her parents was "legal resident for five years before her birth" and she was not a "nanny in the United States."
